name: @validify-js/react
description: validation package for React.js and React Native

scripts.local: npm uninstall -g $npm_package_name && npm run build && npm link $npm_package_name
scripts.build:babel: npm run build && babel dist -d dist
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m "$npm_package_name ($npm_package_version)" && git push origin master
scripts.pub: npm run git && npm run build && npm publish

author: Farid Mansimli
